attributes.action: Start easing Lockdown restrictions from the 15th of February
attributes.additional_details:
The Uk population has all been under some sort of restrictions for 10 months and have given up large parts of their normal lives, to fight this pandemic. We now need to see a way back to normality because the adverse effects of constant lockdowns is creating more problems than it is solving. Mental Health, unemployment, Depression, Education, Cancer treatment, Dementia, Heart Disease and so many more conditions there isn't room to list. The national debt rising and rising.
The Death rate from Covid 19 is around 1% and the UK population has given up so much to help and now we need our lives back and to learn to live with this Disease
attributes.background:
From the 15th of February allow schools/universities to reopen, outdoor sports to commence for all ages, hairdressers and gyms to open. Then have fortnightly schedule for reopening society, with non essential shops, pubs and restaurants, libraries, cinemas and theatres
reopening by March.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government has published a roadmap out of lockdown.
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-response-spring-2021/covid-19-response-spring-2021-summary

If there are specific changes you would like to see to the roadmap, you could start a new petition calling for those changes.
